1�WHAT IS YOUR WISH, MASTER?A PURPLE RIBBON, PLEASE!QUEST REQUIREMENTS, PLEASE!TO HAVE DEFEATED THE BOSS!TO RESET ALL FLAGS, PLEASE!GIMME A HEAP OF PURPLE RIBBONS!
1�This flame seems to be burning a little brighter than the others.
1�Hold the 3???? over the flame?Yes.No.
1�I see you made it this far. I was waiting.
1�People will often sacrifice other living beings to save themselves. Look at yourself. You are no exception.
1�However there is still time. We must call forth the power of the beasts to put an end to the foolish acts of men.
1�Now, let us get our revenge on those who built this world of deceit at the expense of others.
1�Hah. That sound brings back memories...but that is not enough to ease my pain. Come, now, and be my eternal servant.
1�What!? You...
1�Tebhi! Why are you here?
1�You...you searched for me all this time, while I did nothing to try and find you.
1�We traveled the world together, people welcoming us warmly wherever we went. They would laugh and cheer at our show...
1�Their smiling faces did not lie. They truly liked us, and it was only at those times that I felt joy. I had forgotten that laughter, and was controlled by my rage.
1�As long as you are by my side, I need nothing else... I can feel the warmth of those days past return to my bosom.
1�I was a fool. I forgot what was truly important to me--what I truly needed.
1�I no longer have any use for this. I give it to you.
1�Me? I think it is time I set off on a long, long journey.
1�I thank you again for reuniting me with Tebhi. I will never forget your kindness.
1�Let us go. The world awaits...
1�You play the requiem for the soul that sleeps in this sarcophagus.
1�Even if you tried, it would be a futile effort. You cannot get away from a Mithran Tracker.
1�Did you find her name?
1�......She definitely appears to be interred here...
1�What's this...? $????? The daughter's...?
1�There's nothing left of the body, but...This is enough. There's nothing more we can do here. Let's return to Chieftainness Perih Vashai.
1�The names of the deceased are carved upon the stone.
1�The name of the sinner's daughter, Syu Befrathi, is here!
1�<Sigh> So father has sent another adventurer to babysit me... I grant you permission to accompany me, but I request that you stay out of my way.4
1�Oh my Gob! You're one of those adventurerurers, aren't ya?You got nothin' on me, ?[man./lady.] I was just mindin' my own businesesess, lookin' for junk an' stuff.
1�Hey, watch out. You don't wanna fight me. I'll turn you into meat jerky!Wait, how about you and me be friends instead? Sound good?
1�I travel all over the world and hear lots of differererent stories. I even hear your stories. I can tell you one, if you want.
1�Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.

1�What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.Escort for Hire (San d'Oria).Fire and Brimstone(pt.1).Fire and Brimstone(pt.2).A New Dawn.The Requiem.Girl in the Looking Glass.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Now, listen close...
1�Boo-hah-hah?`...kupo!
1�Huh? Why aren't you jumping out of your skin in absolute terror?I would've died of fright, kupo!
1�Here, take this as a testament to your courage.Exchange it for the item your partner received so you can prove that you both reached the goal safely, kupo!
1�Return with the evidence of your success to the moogle in town. Handing over your partner's item will prove that you were both able to reach me, kupo!
1�Oh, and here's a picture of how your partner's face looked when I popped out of nowhere to scare you. You should hand this in at the same time, kupo!Kupupupu...
1�This place is crawling with nasties.You should probably head back to town so you can testify to your partner's bravery.
1�Boo-hah-hah?`...kupo!
1�Why do ghosts say ??boo,?? anyway?
1�I heard that going to a dark, scary dungeon is the best way to test your courage.This place definitely qualifies, kupo!
1�Maybe I'm doing something wrong, kupo?
1�If it gets out that I haven't scared the wits out of a single person yet, I'm going to get into trouble, kupo...

1�You find a brown cap on the ground!5
1�It's okay now.No more tears.5
1�You're safe now.Let me see you smile!5
1�You'll be okay now, kid.No need to cry.5
1�You're safe now, child.Come, come. Wipe away those tears.5
1�You're safe now.No more tears, okay?5
1�It's okay. I'm here now.Let's see you smile!5
1�Hush now, child.You're safe with me.5
1�Aw, aren't you adorable!C'mon, no more tears now.5
1�You're safe now, child.Come, come. Wipe away those tears.5
1�There's nothing to worry about anymore.5
1�Every little thing's gonna be alright.Give us a smile, eh?5
1�Simmer down now! You needn't worry so much.5
1�Quick, run and hide!5
1�Mommy...<sniff>I want to go home...5
1�I-I'm scared...I want to go home...5
�A grounds tome has been placed here by the Adventurers' Mutual Aid Network (A.M.A.N.). Useful information pertaining to various topics on field operations fills its pages.

1�What will you do?Nothing.Read about individual training.Review current training regime.Cancel current training regime.Read about field support.Read about prowesses.Review active prowesses.

1�Read up on what?Nothing for now.Voidwatch Ops.How to participate.?5????.Stratum abyssite.Alignment.Atmacite.Periapt.

1�The Voidwatch is a fellowship of men and women come together to defend the world from extradimensional invaders called ??Voidwalkers.?? Driven only by an insatiable appetite for destruction, these fell horrors roam the space between dimensions, ever seeking to enter and plunge Vana'diel into chaos.

1�Faced with the risk of mass invasion, Voidwatch leaders devised a strategy wherein potential threats are preemptively neutralized.This act was made possible through the discovery of voidstones, magicked objects capable of rendering Voidwalkers visible to be summarily dispatched.
1�Such efforts to stem the rise of Voidwalkers, collectively dubbed ??Voidwatch Operations,?? or ??Ops?? for short, take place in the vicinity of planar rifts--weak points in the fabric of space.

1�A single person may initiate a Voidwatch operation, at which time ??Voidwatcher?? status will be bestowed upon all qualifying party and alliance members, allowing them to commence battle with the target Voidwalker.

1�Voidwatch Ops are subject to a time limit. Exceed this limit and Voidwatcher status will be revoked for all involved, bringing the confrontation to an end. Individuals straying too far from the site of battle, too, will find themselves relieved of the status.

1�Know also that those who take on the burden of the Voidwatcher become temporarily isolated and unable to receive aid from the outside world.Such is the arduous nature of transdimensional encounters.
1�Initiating a Voidwatch operation requires a voidstone, as well as a stratum abyssite attuned to a particular planar rift.
1�Only one person needs to be in possession of these objects for all party and alliance members to participate.
1�However, there exists a number of participation conditions that must be observed.

1�When an operation commences, a single voidstone will be expended for all who possess it.These combatants will have the opportunity to improve their spoils by manipulating spectral alignment values during battle.
1�Conversely, those not possessing their own voidstone will be limited in the spoils they can obtain.
1�The ??voidstone?? is a magicked object which, when coupled with stratum abyssite, is capable of rendering Voidwalkers visible.

1�Only a single combatant need possess a voidstone to allow all party and alliance members to participate in a Voidwatch operation.Those without one, however, will find their spoils limited in both quantity and quality.
1�As a single voidstone is automatically expended when the battle commences, it is recommended that you keep stock of your inventory.
1�Those wishing to obtain the stones should speak to a Voidwatch officer, who is charged with issuing a set quantity at fixed intervals.
1�Stratum abyssite are dynamic stones capable of evolution. By absorbing the energies emitted by felled Voidwalkers, they become attuned with other planar rifts.
1�After defeating your quarry, present your stone to an atmacite refiner--specialists in the study of otherworld geology--to have its properties determined.
1�Stratum abyssite growth occurs independently of voidstones, and the latter is not required to trigger development.

1�Each dimension is composed of its own existential spectrum to which objects of that world are aligned. The act of rendering a Voidwalker visible is essentially an act of aligning oneself to its existential spectrum.

1�While Voidwatchers are able to, for all practical purposes, interact with such creatures, they in fact fall short of full alignment. Symptoms of this imperfect state can be observed in the limited quantity and quality of spoils normally yielded by Voidwalkers.

1�Compensating measures, however, exist which allow combatants to more closely attune themselves with their extradimensional foe. One such method involves the use of alignment-enhancing artifacts known as ??ascent items.??
1�Alignment values raised through ascent items will remain in place until such time as a riftworn pyxis is opened at the end of a successful operation.
1�Those participating in Voidwatch Ops are recommended to plan ahead in order to make effective use of ascent items.
1�Alignment values can also be raised in the midst of battle by striking at enemy weaknesses, causing their existential attunement to shift to your advantage.

1�Blows can be dealt with abilities such as weapon skills and magic spells, and your choice of weakness and the manner in which you strike it will determine which hue of the alignment spectrum is affected.
1�The existential spectrum is comprised of five lights (blue, red, yellow, green, and white), each of which influences reward yield.
1�The precise workings of each light can be reviewed when examining your current alignment values.
1�Upon the successful conclusion of battle, the alignment bonus as granted by ascent items and the exploitation of enemy weaknesses are combined to determine the spoils.

1�Be forewarned: Voidwalkers are highly guileful beings and will not suffer the same weakness being struck twice. Combatants must be on constant watch for any changes that may occur during the course of battle.
1�Atmacite is the physical agglomeration of a monster's soul, and a vessel for its feral instincts.By infusing atmacite to one's body using 6????, it is possible to enhance one's battle prowess.
1�Be aware, however, that powers granted by atmacite can be tapped only when engaged in a Voidwatch operation.
1�Atmacite is resilient and will not be expended in the infusion process.
1�Furthermore, infused atmacite will remain in place until voluntarily purged.
1�As the configuration of atmacite is not possible during an operation, be sure to see to your battle preparations ahead of time.
1�Cruor can be used to enrich atmacite, enhancing its potency. The amount of cruor required for enrichment and the resultant properties vary with atmacite.

1�Atmacite can be enriched in stages to a maximum of level 
�.
1�All Voidwatchers are urged to make atmacite enrichment a priority, for they might just mean the difference between life and death.
1�Periapt are lucky charms that grant myriad beneficial effects ranging from improved vitality to general upturns in fortune.
1�Especially sought after are those bestowing temporary items at the commencement of an operation, granting combatants a distinct advantage against the enemy.
1�Although their acquisition can only be described as arduous, the benefits make them well worth the effort.

1�The Voidwatch is a fellowship of men and women come together to defend the world from extradimensional invaders called ??Voidwalkers.?? Driven only by an insatiable appetite for destruction, these fell horrors roam the space between dimensions, ever seeking to enter and plunge Vana'diel into chaos.

1�Faced with the risk of mass invasion, Voidwatch leaders devised a strategy wherein potential threats are preemptively neutralized.This act was made possible through the discovery of voidstones, magicked objects capable of rendering Voidwalkers visible to be summarily dispatched.
1�Such efforts to stem the rise of Voidwalkers, collectively dubbed ??Voidwatch Operations,?? or ??Ops?? for short, take place in the vicinity of planar rifts--weak points in the fabric of space.

1�A single person may initiate a Voidwatch operation, at which time ??Voidwatcher?? status will be bestowed upon all qualifying party and alliance members, allowing them to commence battle with the target Voidwalker.

1�Voidwatch Ops are subject to a time limit. Exceed this limit and Voidwatcher status will be revoked for all involved, bringing the confrontation to an end. Individuals straying too far from the site of battle, too, will find themselves relieved of the status.

1�Know also that those who take on the burden of the Voidwatcher become temporarily isolated and unable to receive aid from the outside world.Such is the arduous nature of transdimensional encounters.
1�Initiating a Voidwatch operation requires a voidstone, as well as a stratum abyssite attuned to a particular planar rift.
1�Only one person needs to be in possession of these objects for all party and alliance members to participate.
1�However, there exists a number of participation conditions that must be observed.

1�When an operation commences, a single voidstone will be expended for all who possess it.These combatants will have the opportunity to improve their spoils by manipulating spectral alignment values during battle.
1�Conversely, those not possessing their own voidstone will be limited in the spoils they can obtain.
1�The ??voidstone?? is a magicked object which, when coupled with stratum abyssite, is capable of rendering Voidwalkers visible.

1�Only a single combatant need possess a voidstone to allow all party and alliance members to participate in a Voidwatch operation.Those without one, however, will find their spoils limited in both quantity and quality.
1�As a single voidstone is automatically expended when the battle commences, it is recommended that you keep stock of your inventory.
1�Those wishing to obtain the stones should speak to a Voidwatch officer, who is charged with issuing a set quantity at fixed intervals.
1�Stratum abyssite are dynamic stones capable of evolution. By absorbing the energies emitted by felled Voidwalkers, they become attuned with other planar rifts.
1�After defeating your quarry, present your stone to an atmacite refiner--specialists in the study of otherworld geology--to have its properties determined.
1�Stratum abyssite growth occurs independently of voidstones, and the latter is not required to trigger development.

1�Each dimension is composed of its own existential spectrum to which objects of that world are aligned. The act of rendering a Voidwalker visible is essentially an act of aligning oneself to its existential spectrum.

1�While Voidwatchers are able to, for all practical purposes, interact with such creatures, they in fact fall short of full alignment. Symptoms of this imperfect state can be observed in the limited quantity and quality of spoils normally yielded by Voidwalkers.

1�Compensating measures, however, exist which allow combatants to more closely attune themselves with their extradimensional foe. One such method involves the use of alignment-enhancing artifacts known as ??ascent items.??
1�Alignment values raised through ascent items will remain in place until such time as a riftworn pyxis is opened at the end of a successful operation.
1�Those participating in Voidwatch Ops are recommended to plan ahead in order to make effective use of ascent items.
1�Alignment values can also be raised in the midst of battle by striking at enemy weaknesses, causing their existential attunement to shift to your advantage.

1�Blows can be dealt with abilities such as weapon skills and magic spells, and your choice of weakness and the manner in which you strike it will determine which hue of the alignment spectrum is affected.
1�The existential spectrum is comprised of five lights (blue, red, yellow, green, and white), each of which influences reward yield.
1�The precise workings of each light can be reviewed when examining your current alignment values.
1�Upon the successful conclusion of battle, the alignment bonus as granted by ascent items and the exploitation of enemy weaknesses are combined to determine the spoils.

1�Be forewarned: Voidwalkers are highly guileful beings and will not suffer the same weakness being struck twice. Combatants must be on constant watch for any changes that may occur during the course of battle.
1�Atmacite is the physical agglomeration of a monster's soul, and a vessel for its feral instincts.By infusing atmacite to one's body using 6????, it is possible to enhance one's battle prowess.
1�Be aware, however, that powers granted by atmacite can be tapped only when engaged in a Voidwatch operation.
1�Atmacite is resilient and will not be expended in the infusion process.
1�Furthermore, infused atmacite will remain in place until voluntarily purged.
1�As the configuration of atmacite is not possible during an operation, be sure to see to your battle preparations ahead of time.
1�Cruor can be used to enrich atmacite, enhancing its potency. The amount of cruor required for enrichment and the resultant properties vary with atmacite.

1�Atmacite can be enriched in stages to a maximum of level 
�.
1�All Voidwatchers are urged to make atmacite enrichment a priority, for they might just mean the difference between life and death.
1�Periapt are lucky charms that grant myriad beneficial effects ranging from improved vitality to general upturns in fortune.
1�Especially sought after are those bestowing temporary items at the commencement of an operation, granting combatants a distinct advantage against the enemy.
1�Although their acquisition can only be described as arduous, the benefits make them well worth the effort.

1�My name is Sverdhried.It's quite possible that not a soul will ever hear these words of mine, but I record them nonetheless in hopes that a future runeist will come across this device.
1�Much to my surprise, some ancient civilization seems to have erected tombs underneath the rolling foothills that exemplify this region.

1�The resolute door that guards the entrance caused me to question the importance of entering after battling with it for what seemed like hours, but in the end, curiosity triumphed over physical pain.

1�??Perhaps I'll just place the tip of my boot inside,?? I thought to myself as I took my first step into the gaping maw before me, then found myself fiddling with another of these mysterious machinations when I'd come to my senses.
1�I quickly learned that this particular recording instrument resonates with Ignis, melter of ice and singer of flesh.

1�Ah, yes...Ignis. The rune of the flame.One could certainly rationalize the relationship of Ignis to this location by saying the flames of passion that burn bright within the spirits of those who now lay buried here must endeavor to release Father Time's frozen grip upon this mausoleum.
1�However, I posit that Ignis's flickering flames are relics from ancient rituals where the dead were seen off to the afterlife with gigantic bonfires.
